quotes.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Hilary Hinton "Zig" Ziglar

quotes.text: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Every man is guilty of all the good he didn't do.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Appreciation is a wonderful thing: It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: No problem can withstand the assault of sustained thinking.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Tyrants have always some slight shade of virtue; they support the laws before destroying them.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: It is dangerous to be right in matters on which the established authorities are wrong.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Prejudices are what fools use for reason.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: If you fulfill your obligations every day you donâ€™t need to worry about the future.
quotes.author: Dr Jordan B. Peterson

quotes.text: When you have something to say, silence is a lie.
quotes.author: Dr Jordan B. Peterson

quotes.text: Compare yourself to who you were yesterday, not to who someone else is today.
quotes.author: Dr Jordan B. Peterson

quotes.text: Love is the desire to see unnecessary suffering ameliorated.
quotes.author: Dr Jordan B. Peterson

quotes.text: Dialogue is the pathway to truth.
quotes.author: Dr Jordan B. Peterson

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
